entries.title: AI Decision Engine v2 & Performance Boost

changes.text: AI Decision Engine v2 with contextual learning — routes workflows 40% more accurately based on historical run patterns
Parallel action execution — run independent steps concurrently for up to 3x faster workflows
Workflow builder canvas performance improved by 60% for automations with 20+ steps
Dashboard KPI cards now update in real-time via WebSocket connections
Resolved issue where scheduled triggers could fire twice during DST transitions
Fixed pagination bug in runs table when filtering by multiple statuses simultaneously
Native Snowflake data warehouse integration — query, insert, and sync data directly
Comprehensive audit log system with exportable CSV reports for compliance purposes
Custom webhook response templates — return dynamic data from automation results
Team invitation flow redesigned with role descriptions and bulk invite support
Error messages now include actionable fix suggestions powered by our knowledge base
OAuth token refresh race condition in multi-step automations has been resolved
Full version history for automations — view diffs, compare versions, and roll back with one click
Workflow template library with 25 pre-built automation patterns for common use cases
Dark mode support with automatic system preference detection and manual toggle
Run details panel now shows step-by-step execution timeline with data payloads
Resolved memory leak in the workflow builder canvas when switching between large automations
Deprecated legacy API v0 endpoints — all clients should migrate to v1
Configurable alert rules with threshold-based triggers for failure rates, latency, and usage
Slack and webhook notification channels for alerts alongside existing email notifications
Analytics dashboard redesigned with interactive charts, drill-down capabilities, and date range picker
Search across all entities (projects, automations, runs, docs) via Cmd/Ctrl+K command palette
Fixed timezone handling in scheduled triggers for teams spanning multiple regions
Completely redesigned dashboard with modern UI, improved navigation, and faster load times
Visual workflow builder with drag-and-drop interface replacing the previous form-based editor
AI-powered decision engine for intelligent workflow routing and anomaly detection
200+ native integrations marketplace (up from 50 in v1)
Enterprise features: SSO/SAML, SOC 2 compliance tools, and dedicated support
API completely rewritten as v1 with RESTful design, better error handling, and comprehensive documentation
Legacy workflow format — automatic migration provided for all v1 automations
v1 to v2 migration assistant — automatically converts existing workflows to the new format
Data export tool for downloading all workspace data as JSON or CSV
API rate limits increased to 100 requests per minute for all paid plans
Critical fix for data loss issue when deleting a project with active automations
Resolved file upload size validation inconsistency between UI and API
